unnormalised: So, my friend Ramesh was applying for this IT job at TCS. He was super stressed 'cause he lost his college ID - roll no. AX12345. Then, he couldn't find his PAN card, ABCDE1234F. Apparently, for the background check, they wanted his Aadhaar no. too, which he luckily remembered: 1234 5678 9012. He spent 2 days just gathering these IDs! Hopefully, all goes well, and he gets the job. These days itâ€™s so important.
normalised: So, my friend Ramesh was applying for this I-T job at T-C-S. He was super stressed 'cause he lost his college I-D - roll no. A-X-one-two-three-four-five. Then, he couldn't find his P-A-N card, A-B-C-D-E-one-two-three-four-F. Apparently, for the background check, they wanted his Aadhaar no. too, which he luckily remembered: one-two-three-four five-six-seven-eight nine-zero-one-two. He spent two days just gathering these I-Ds! Hopefully, all goes well, and he gets the job. These days it's so important.
